show.title: Niththam Oru Yuththam
show.description: Meendum oru marma noi... Moolai urainthu  palar maranamadaigiraarkal. detective jegathalap prathabanum theeya sakthi scientist Jadayuvum aadum aadupuli aattaththinaik kettu magizhungal...
